channel.title: Wanderhome kickstarter
channel.description:
Does anyone know much about this Kickstarter? Animal folk wandering around helping each other and herding giant bumble bees. Seems and looks pretty adorable, but I don’t know much more about it.
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/jdragsky/wanderhome

item.title: Wanderhome kickstarter
item.dc:creator: @chihuahuazero
item.description:
@chihuahuazero wrote:

I’m not surprised that the Wanderhome kickstarter met its goal within hours, but it testifies to the energy in the indie TTRPG community that it’s now at $60,000 and could make 100k by the campaign’s end.

I looked through the playkit and I enjoyed the coziness and how the mechanics reinforce that tone. I hope it ends up being a strong work in the Belonging Outside Belonging genre.

Read full topic

item.title: Wanderhome kickstarter
item.dc:creator: @Tom_Pleasant
item.description:
@Tom_Pleasant wrote:

Mainly what you’ve told me: that they’re a good team likely to deliver a good game. Thank you!

I’ve really been looking for some more non-violent games to use as as an introduction to gaming for several folk and this looks like it could have potential. That’s a really long delivery time though!

Read full topic

item.title: Wanderhome kickstarter
item.dc:creator: @Majcher
item.description:
@Majcher wrote:

Same—I’ve been following Jay’s work for a while, and read through the preview kit (but haven’t had a chance to play yet). The game itself, in the BOB family tree, looks super sweet, and I am super excited to see what the final product looks like. Backed it as soon as I could, and I’m eagerly awaiting the goodies.

Read full topic

item.title: Wanderhome kickstarter
item.dc:creator: @flatvurm
item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

Yeah, I’ve been looking forward to this one for a while now, and am excited to see it launch! What kind of info were you wondering about? If rules, you can get a good feel for the game with the preview playkit, free to download! If you’re wondering about reliability, I have full confidence in the designer and it’s a pretty crackerjack team they’ve got goin’ on there.

Read full topic

item.title: Wanderhome kickstarter
item.dc:creator: @Tom_Pleasant
item.description:
@Tom_Pleasant wrote:

Does anyone know much about this Kickstarter? Animal folk wandering around helping each other and herding giant bumble bees. Seems and looks pretty adorable, but I don’t know much more about it.

Kickstarter

Wanderhome

A pastoral fantasy tabletop RPG about traveling animal-folk and the way they change with the seasons.
